statements: DELETE FROM wind_turbine_performance_data WHERE power_output_kW < 100 AND wind_speed_mph > 20;
DELETE FROM wind_turbine_performance_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE turbine_id = 1 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM wind_turbine_performance_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND wind_speed > 10;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance'
